title: FS: Nap Rucker Throwing Piedmont Factory 42. SGC 2.5 - SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: Nap Rucker Throwing Piedmont Factory 42. SGC 2.5 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Have this Nap Rucker throwing with a tough Piedmont 460 Factory 42 back. Card just came back from SGC and is graded 2.5

Asking 359 for him. Will consider trades for EPDGs and PSA 4 commons.

Thanks for looking!
Jeff
